title: ForkingPickler: TypeError: __init__() missing 3 required positional arguments: 'type', 'value', and 'context'
body:
In GitLab by @timthelion on Nov 23, 2018, 09:51

*Please describe how you installed Flake8*

```
$ pipenv install --dev --system
```

With the following dev packages (along with others).

```
"flake8" = "*"
"flake8-blind-except" = "*"
"flake8-comprehensions" = "*"
"flake8-import-order" = "*"
"flake8-tidy-imports" = "*"
"flake8-builtins" = "*"
"flake8_strict" = "*"
```

*Please provide the exact, unmodified output of `flake8 --bug-report`*

```
{
  "dependencies": [
    {
      "dependency": "setuptools",
      "version": "40.6.2"
    }
  ],
  "platform": {
    "python_implementation": "CPython",
    "python_version": "3.5.5",
    "system": "Linux"
  },
  "plugins": [
    {
      "is_local": false,
      "plugin": "flake8-blind-except",
      "version": "0.1.1"
    },
    {
      "is_local": false,
      "plugin": "flake8-comprehensions",
      "version": "1.4.1"
    },
    {
      "is_local": false,
      "plugin": "flake8-tidy-imports",
      "version": "1.1.0"
    },
    {
      "is_local": false,
      "plugin": "flake8_builtins",
      "version": "1.4.1"
    },
    {
      "is_local": false,
      "plugin": "flake8_strict",
      "version": "0.2.1"
    },
    {
      "is_local": false,
      "plugin": "import-order",
      "version": "0.18"
    },
    {
      "is_local": false,
      "plugin": "mccabe",
      "version": "0.6.1"
    },
    {
      "is_local": false,
      "plugin": "pycodestyle",
      "version": "2.4.0"
    },
    {
      "is_local": false,
      "plugin": "pyflakes",
      "version": "2.0.0"
    }
  ],
  "version": "3.6.0"
}
```

*Please describe the problem or feature*

```
$ flake8
Exception in thread Thread-3:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/threading.py", line 914, in _bootstrap_inner
    self.run()
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/threading.py", line 862, in run
    self._target(*self._args, **self._kwargs)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/multiprocessing/pool.py", line 463, in _handle_results
    task = get()
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/multiprocessing/connection.py", line 251, in recv
    return ForkingPickler.loads(buf.getbuffer())
TypeError: __init__() missing 3 required positional arguments: 'type', 'value', and 'context'
```

*If this is a bug report, please explain with examples (and example code) what you expected to happen and what actually happened.*

```
$ flake8
$ # No output
```
